snippet: The comeback by Peyton Manning and the Broncos was one part of the story on Monday night. In San Diego, they won't soon forget the blowing of a 24-0 halftime lead.
abstract: The comeback by Peyton Manning and the Broncos was one part of the story on Monday night. In San Diego, they won't soon forget the blowing of a 24-0 halftime lead.

headline.main: View From San Diego After Epic Collapse
